block.p: SCHNOLL-Bernard. Of Oradell, NJ on July 28, 2000. Cherished husband of Constance (nee Rintels). Beloved son of Ida (nee Schiller) Schnoll and the late Nathan. Devoted father of Suzanne (Robert) Stempinski, Michael (Velma) Schnoll and Stephen Schnoll. Dear brother of Eleanor (Paul) Ellis. Loving grandfather of David and Lisa Schnoll. Services ''Gutterman-Musicant'', 402 Park St, Hackensack, NJ, Monday, noon. The mourning period will be observed at the family residence through Wednesday evening. In lieu of flowers contributions may be made to The H.U.M.C., 30 Prospect Avenue, Hackensack, NJ or Temple Sholom, River Edge, NJ.
